text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI
COLLEGE OF LIBERAL ARTS
UNIVERSITY, MISSISSIPPI
DEPARTMENT OF SPEECH AND THEATER
Radio Station WCBH
The Speech and Hearing Clinic
The University Theater
August 25, 1964
national Assn, of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue , N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Bear Sir:
We are interested in the possibility of affiliation with
the N.A.E.B. Would you please send me some information
concerning membership and services of the association?
I notice in the current issue of BROADCASTING that your
national convention is being held in Austin, Texas, this
year. I would appreciate some information and/or a
program of the meeting in order to be able to make plans
to attend.
Sincerely
Bu.HVJCLIi iUil OCD1UC
Director of Broadcasting
Box 5
University, Miss. 38677
